document.full_text: seven workers at an intel corp microchip manufacturing complex outside phoenix were injured by a small explosion there on tuesday, fire officials reported, but the company said production was unaffected.
document.title: blast at intel arizona microchip complex injures 7
lines_and_colors: seven workers at an intel corp microchip manufacturing complex outside phoenix were injured by a small explosion there on tuesday, fire officials reported, but the company said production was unaffected.
